extendedInfo.description: Great personal finance manager that keeps track of your spending, income and savings. Refreshingly simple, quick and easy to use.You can use it offline, it will sync online automatically when possible. It is not a stand alone app, it is backed up by Finance41.com. All financial information is synchronized online, and can be accessed from your computer's browser, presenting the bigger picture. Mind the costs.Provides widgets for:- account balances - check your balances from the home screen- add transaction - quickest add transaction experienceMoney is kind of important, it should be monitored. Finance41 helps you:- keep track of your money, - manage your expenses, income and transfers from one account to another - see your accounts balances- set budgetsThe app is designed to be extremely simple, easier to use than an Excel spreadsheet, but also very powerful.Finance41.com, the web app, offers all the features you need:- recurrent transactions- large, insightful charts- money accounts and tags editing- transactions that need to be confirmedand more.Finance41 is a really cheap service, and for many, free. Here's the cost:- First month the app is unlimited for free.- Then the app limits transactions inserting to 3 transactions per day unless a 2 dollars a month subscription is payed.So if you usually have less than 90 transactions per month, youâll be just fine using the app for free. If you need more, the subscription is really cheap.The only difference between having and not having a subscription is the 3 transaction inserts per day limit, nothing else. You own your financial data, you will always be able to access, edit, and analyse it from any client (web app, Android app, Chrome extension etc.) or export it.Also you can install the Finance41 Chrome extension, to add transactions and check your finances without leaving your current tab.Take control of your finances!Keywords: expense manager, expense management, expense tracker, money manager, personal money manager, savings tracker, saving money, finance, finance manager, personal finance, financisto, personal finance manager, personal finance management, personal money management, budget manager, budget tracker, budget planner, spending tracker, daily expense tracker, expensify, daily expense manager, income tracker, income calculator, mobile banking, savings account, checking account, receipt tracker, receipt scanner, receipt filer, receipt capture, expense log, household budget, family budget, financial planner, smart financial calculator, accounting, finance, accounting software, business accounting, cash register, cash organizer, money, money saving app, money saver, easy money, pocket money, mint, checkbook, book keeping, book keeper, mobile expense tracker, mobile money app, mobile money manager

reviews.title: My choice of finance manager
reviews.comment: Tried several before, but finance41 is the only one that I actually _use_. I love the  basic UI, the tag feature and the web app too. Nice job!
reviews.author: \303\201d\303\241m Berke

reviews.title: Would love desktop experience
reviews.comment: Thank you for this useful application interface to the app. I would love an experience closer to the Chrome desktop experience.  Planned transactions and future balances are my favorite features.
reviews.author: Nicholas Pike

reviews.title: Won\'t let me enter data
reviews.comment: It keeps reminding me that I can only enter 3 transactions a day, but not been able to enter ANY for 3 days. The constant reminder to enter transactions is very annoying.
reviews.author: John Stock

reviews.title: Good Features
reviews.comment: Loved everything about this app except that the recurring transactions are only supported on the web app. Nice themes colors.
reviews.author: Ahmed Abdel Aziz

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It is the. ..
reviews.author: Sun deep

reviews.comment: Sofware completo
reviews.author: Fabio Furlanetti

reviews.title: Once the trial is over
reviews.comment: After the trial period is over. It says user can enter upto 3 transaction s. But doesnt allow me to enter those 3. Everything else s good until trial
reviews.author: Sivaramakrishnan Sankar

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app p is the best so far.  But it needs more improvement and more update with a better marketing. Also some YouTube videos would be great as a tutorial channel.
reviews.author: Botan Abdullah

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app but please consider put sup category or sub tag.
reviews.author: borey moeun

reviews.title: Works fantastic!
reviews.comment: First time i actually liked an app like this. And used it every single day! Will sign up to a paid one once trial runs out.
reviews.author: Michael Alindogan

reviews.title: Very promising
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem to like opening balances that are negative. Haven\'t tried the website yet, but the main reason I\'m using this is for recurrent transactions with balance forecasting. Such a logical feature seems very hard to come by. Byline the ui so far, could do with some very basic reporting /chatting to complement the website features. Will relate shortly.
reviews.author: Nader H

reviews.title: no use
reviews.comment: I registered my user id and password. On log in invalid email or password there is no provision to create new pass word. again  go to new registration your email already exists. very poor.
reviews.author: Suryanarayanan S

reviews.title: Simple yet cool app.
reviews.comment: I\'ve just installed your application. It fast, it light, it simple, it cool!  However, I face a problem here. I forgot to insert initial balances for both of my cash and my bank account. Thus, the current balances are now undervalued. Is there any way to insert both balance values?
reviews.author: Rendra Sebastian Delano

reviews.comment: Reminder to email them if you are using the \"free\" limited version stops everything from working. What bullcrap.
reviews.author: Nellan Govender

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: A simple and clean register to keep my finances in check.
reviews.author: Ty B

reviews.title: Ok, but
reviews.comment: Requires sign-up and monthly fee for most.
reviews.author: Michael Monroe O\'Gollaher

reviews.title: Multiple Currency option
reviews.comment: There is no option for different currency for different account. Have a look on expense manager application. This is a good interface. I love this. But I need multiple currency option for 5 rating. I am expecting soon from this application.
reviews.author: Sivaramu Lingaprahasam

reviews.title: Beautifully simple
reviews.comment: It has made tracking finance fun! And the app is great for traveling!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great free app
reviews.author: Ace Jologz

reviews.title: Are you kidding me?
reviews.comment: Just by the time I start enjoying the app it stops being free... i loved the app and I don\'t mind paying for it (hey I\'m a developer myself I understand), but the price is too expensive and not worth it... user dosent get the chance to see how good the app is if they cannot try it for a whole month and 3 transactions just doesn\'t do any good...
reviews.author: Behrang Eskandari
